short_desc: Accepts donation of children's coat in good condition for distribution to needy children in the county, distribution are from November to February, 2014. For more details call 510-689-7601 or email to imaginethatkids@yahoo.com. Also adult coats are someti.....more
description: Accepts donation of children's coat in good condition for distribution to needy children in the county, distribution are from November to February, 2014. For more details call 510-689-7601 or email to imaginethatkids@yahoo.com. Also adult coats are sometime available.
